languages.text: {n}Вайс мрачно хмурится, вслушиваясь в двусмысленные речи сверкающей улыбками Вистенцы. Печать мрачных подозрений легла на его лицо, но он хранит траурное молчание.{/n}
{n}Weisz frowns gloomily as he listens to Vistenza's equivocations punctuated by glowing smiles. Shadows of dark suspicions have fallen on his face, but he keeps a mournful silence.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вайс мрачно хмурится, вслушиваясь в двусмысленные речи сверкающей улыбками Вистенцы. Печать мрачных подозрений легла на его лицо, но он хранит траурное молчание.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Weisz frunce el ceño, sombrío, mientras escucha las evasivas que ofrece Vistenza con una amplia sonrisa. La sombra de la sospecha más oscura es visible en su rostro, pero mantiene un silencio lúgubre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz frowns gloomily as he listens to Vistenza's equivocations punctuated by glowing smiles. Shadows of dark suspicions have fallen on his face, but he keeps a mournful silence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Weisz frunce el ceño, sombrío, mientras escucha las evasivas que ofrece Vistenza con una amplia sonrisa. La sombra de la sospecha más oscura es visible en su rostro, pero mantiene un silencio lúgubre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ヴィステンツァの微笑み混じりの曖昧な言葉を聞きながら、ワイズは憂鬱そうに顔をしかめる。その顔には暗い疑惑の影が落ちているが、痛々しい沈黙を守っている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz frowns gloomily as he listens to Vistenza's equivocations punctuated by glowing smiles. Shadows of dark suspicions have fallen on his face, but he keeps a mournful silence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィステンツァの微笑み混じりの曖昧な言葉を聞きながら、ワイズは憂鬱そうに顔をしかめる。その顔には暗い疑惑の影が落ちているが、痛々しい沈黙を守っている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}维丝坦萨的说法含混其辞，时不时露出灿烂的笑容。威茨听着她的话，忧郁地皱着眉头，脸上浮现起了怀疑的阴影，但始终保持着哀伤的沉默。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz frowns gloomily as he listens to Vistenza's equivocations punctuated by glowing smiles. Shadows of dark suspicions have fallen on his face, but he keeps a mournful silence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}维丝坦萨的说法含混其辞，时不时露出灿烂的笑容。威茨听着她的话，忧郁地皱着眉头，脸上浮现起了怀疑的阴影，但始终保持着哀伤的沉默。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Weisz lauscht mit düster gerunzelter Stirn Vistenzas Ausflüchten, die immer wieder von einem strahlenden Lächeln unterstrichen werden. Schatten dunklen Misstrauens haben sich über sein Gesicht gelegt, doch er schweigt trauervoll.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz frowns gloomily as he listens to Vistenza's equivocations punctuated by glowing smiles. Shadows of dark suspicions have fallen on his face, but he keeps a mournful silence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Weisz lauscht mit düster gerunzelter Stirn Vistenzas Ausflüchten, die immer wieder von einem strahlenden Lächeln unterstrichen werden. Schatten dunklen Misstrauens haben sich über sein Gesicht gelegt, doch er schweigt trauervoll.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'air sombre, Weisz se renfrogne en écoutant les insinuations ponctuées de sourires narquois de Vistenza. Si l'ombre de sinistres soupçons s'est abattue sur son visage, il reste muré dans un silence lugubre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz frowns gloomily as he listens to Vistenza's equivocations punctuated by glowing smiles. Shadows of dark suspicions have fallen on his face, but he keeps a mournful silence.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Weisz, Vistenza'nın ışıldayan bir gülümsemeyle ataya girerek yaptığı kelime oyunlarını dinlerken kasvetli bir şekilde kaşlarını çatıyor. Yüzüne karanlık kuşkuların gölgeleri çökse de kederli sükûnetini koruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz frowns gloomily as he listens to Vistenza's equivocations punctuated by glowing smiles. Shadows of dark suspicions have fallen on his face, but he keeps a mournful silence.{/n}
